edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.connectfour.GUI

Class BoardDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.connectfour.GUI.AbstractMenu
              • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.connectfour.GUI.BoardDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class BoardDisplay
extends AbstractMenu
    GUI class that handles drawing the board Updates via repaint() which calls paint() also draws the small green circles over winning circles when a win is detected in Board class
    Version:
    CS56 M16 UCSB
    Author:
    Joel Bagan, Bryanna Phan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
